CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "AL" ), "Alumni;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "AW" ), "Alumni Widow;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "SA" ), "Confirmed Admitted Student",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "EM" ), "Employee;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "EF" ), "Former Employee;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "FR" ), "Friend;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "SW" ), "Non-Returning Student;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "PA" ), "Parent;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "PN" ), "Parent of Non-Returning Student;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "RC" ), "Related Child;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "RE" ), "Related Entity;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "ER" ), "Retired Employee;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "ST" ), "Student;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (Contact.ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, "UI" ), "Unknown Individual;",null )
CustomField.label: Constituent Type
